resources.string: Enter the infrared code to be transmitted (Infrared codes for various household appliances can be found at http://www.remotecentral.com/cgi-bin/codes):
Send Popup Attack to Nearby IOS Device Once
Send Popup Attack to Nearby Android Device Once
Send Popup Attack to Nearby Windows Device Once
